mapper.select: SELECT s.board_no, s.mem_no, m.nick, FIND_CODE_NAME(dst1) dst1Name, dst1, FIND_CODE_NAME(dst2) dst2, FIND_CODE_NAME(div) div, img, title, desct, FIND_CODE_NAME(day_div) day_div, FIND_CODE_NAME(wage_div) wage_div, price, FIND_CODE_NAME(cndt) cndt, addr_desct, stts, reg_Date FROM skilled_expert s LEFT JOIN member m ON s.mem_no = m.mem_no WHERE s.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'SKL' || LPAD(skl_seq.nextval, 6, '0') FROM dual
INSERT INTO skilled_expert VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{dst1}, #{dst2}, #{div}, #{img}, #{title}, #{desct}, #{dayDiv}, #{wageDiv}, #{price}, #{cndt}, #{addrDesct}, 'ky', sysdate)

SELECT 'SKLAPL' || LPAD(skl_apl_seq.nextval, 6, '0') FROM dual
INSERT INTO skilled_expert_apply VALUES (#{aplNo}, #{memNo}, #{aplMsg}, #{aplStts}, #{boardNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT apl_no, skl.board_no, apl.mem_no, apl_stts FROM skilled_expert_apply apl LEFT JOIN skilled_expert skl ON apl.board_no = skl.board_no WHERE apl.board_no = #{boardNo}
